personal.preferred_title: Senior Data Engineer | Capacity Planning & AI-Driven Infrastructure Optimization
personal.address: Murphy, TX (Plano area) / 424 Oriole Dr., Murphy, TX 75094

summary: Senior Data Engineer with over 20 years of enterprise experience, specializing in designing and delivering modern data solutions and data pipelines using cloud-based platforms. Proficient in Python, SQL, and cloud technologies like AWS, with a focus on ETL/ELT processes and relational databases for scalable, secure data platforms. Skilled in optimizing data processing systems and integrating AI-driven innovations for advanced analytics. Experienced in collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure data governance and security. Eager to contribute to Fisher Investments’ mission of leveraging technology for superior data management and analytics in Plano, Texas.

flagship_projects.name: Serverless Lakehouse Platform (AWS)
flagship_projects.description: Designed a full serverless data platform using S3, Glue, Athena, and Bedrock. Built a Text-to-SQL GenAI agent with Claude 3 Sonnet. Resolved small file issues using Snappy and Parquet compression. Optimized ETL and data access for enterprise scale.

flagship_projects.name: HorizonScale — AI Capacity Forecasting Engine
flagship_projects.description: Replaced legacy manual processes with a parallel generator-based pipeline, reducing forecasting cycles by 90%. Developed an interactive Streamlit dashboard for real-time capacity insights and 'High Trust' utilization scores. Created a modern agentic pipeline for banking-scale telemetry.

flagship_projects.name: FAST Project
flagship_projects.description: Data mining user performance metrics to optimize critical money-generating systems.

experience.title: Senior Capacity & Data Engineer
bullets: Architected automated ETL pipelines using Python and Pandas to ingest telemetry data from 6,000+ endpoints, replacing manual processes.
Designed optimized Oracle schemas for historical data retention, enabling accurate seasonal risk forecasting.
Developed ML forecasting models with Prophet and scikit-learn to predict capacity bottlenecks 6 months ahead, enhancing provisioning accuracy.
Integrated disparate data feeds into unified Oracle reporting systems with executive dashboards for actionable insights.
Identified underutilized infrastructure through data mining, driving significant cost savings via hardware consolidation.
Built automated reporting workflows and interactive dashboards using Python libraries like matplotlib and plotly.

experience.title: Performance Engineer
bullets: Managed Dynatrace AppMon/Synthetics for critical systems and Brand.com, ensuring optimal performance.
Led 'FAST' project to data-mine real-user performance metrics, providing actionable optimization recommendations.
Upgraded Dynatrace from 6.5 to 7.0, implemented TLS1.2 security, and supported AWS cloud migration.
Designed dashboards for end-to-end functionality and performance metrics analysis.
Analyzed system bottlenecks and proposed performance improvements for enhanced user experience.
Integrated Performance Center with Dynatrace for comprehensive monitoring.

experience.title: APM Consultant
bullets: Supported enterprise CA APM, CEM, and ADA for utility systems monitoring.
Managed and supported monitoring solutions including CA APM, CA CEM, and CA ADA.

experience.title: Senior Consultant / SME for CA APM
bullets: Led large-scale CA APM implementations and upgrades (9.1 to 10.1), managing 4,000–6,000 agents across environments.
Designed custom Management Modules, dashboards, alerts, and Perl/Ksh scripts for data extraction.
Provided sizing recommendations, created Golden Images, and trained clients on APM solutions.
Collaborated with IT teams to troubleshoot performance issues in J2EE and WebLogic environments.
Optimized agent and enterprise manager installations for improved monitoring efficiency.
Documented implementations and supported clients as a CA APM SME for TIAA-CREF.

experience.title: Performance Test Engineer
bullets: Analyzed J2EE telecom applications to identify load and break points for optimal performance.
Documented critical metrics including JDBC connections, threads, memory, CPU, and garbage collection.
Installed JMX, Thread Dumps, and Wily Introscope for comprehensive monitoring.
Created automation scripts to streamline performance testing processes.

experience.title: Senior Systems & Data Migration Engineer
bullets: Led migration of 200+ MySQL nodes to a 6-node Oracle RAC cluster for a high-throughput shopping engine.
Optimized C++/OCCI transaction processing, reducing hardware footprint by 95% while maintaining sub-second latency.
Built a CPPUNIT testing framework to automate conversion and ensure data integrity.
Refactored systems to handle 10x the throughput of VISA with minimal hardware resources.

experience.title: Architect/Developer (IRS CADE Project)
bullets: Performed UML-based unit design for a CICS/MQSeries/XML/DB2 system modernization.
Developed modules for IRS systems using VC++ and DB2 integration.
Designed messaging architecture leveraging CICS and MQSeries for robust data flow.

experience.title: Developer / Support Engineer (Billing, Interfaces, CSM/PRMS)
bullets: Developed high-availability multithreaded C++ interfaces using POSIX, sockets, and Marconi APIs.
Enhanced billing performance with C/C++/Pro*C/PL/SQL, achieving 75% memory reduction and 10x database performance.
Automated system administration for WebLogic/WebSphere using Korn Shell scripts.
Designed and implemented interfaces with UML, Rational Rose, and design patterns like Functors.
Troubleshot Enabler/CSM/EMS modules and supported production environments with database queries.
Reverse-engineered and documented AMDOCS PRM and APIs for improved system understanding.

experience.title: Developer
bullets: Developed time and attendance interfaces using VB6 and VC++ for operational efficiency.
